attributes.action: Enforce "unscrupulous site owners" to obey the terms of the Mobile Homes Act 1983 and Implied Terms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to enable mobile home residents to have equal rights with other home owners in the United Kingdom and to stop these unscrupulous site owners from overcharging for services by ignoring requests for sight of original water, gas and electricity bills.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
